snippet: Expressing scientific terms through sign language has long been difficult, but the Internet and online videos are helping to broaden the available vocabulary.
abstract: Advocates for the deaf are pushing to expand and standardize science-related sign language vocabulary; lack of a scientific vocabulary has long been a stumbling block for many deaf science students and their teachers, making it that much harder for the students to excel in science and pursue careers in it.
lead_paragraph: Expressing scientific terms through sign language has long been difficult, but the Internet and online videos are helping to broaden the available vocabulary.
